summary.span: 表示要对数据源执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建 的实例时，读/写属性将设置为其初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to their initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 功能在数据源中执行命令的方法如下： features the following methods executing commands at a data source: |项Item|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| ||执行返回行的命令。Executes commands that return rows. 如果用于执行 SQL SET 语句之类的命令， 可能不会产生所需的效果。 may not have the effect that you want if used to execute commands such as SQL SET statements.| ||执行 SQL INSERT、DELETE、UPDATE 和 SET 语句等命令。Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||检索单个值，例如数据库中的聚合值。Retrieves a single value, for example, an aggregate value from a database.| 可以重置 属性，并重新使用 对象。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 但是，必须先关闭 ，然后才能执行新的或前一个命令。However, you must close the before you can execute a new or previous command. 如果某个严重 （例如，SQL Server 严重级别为20或更高）由执行 的方法生成，则 该连接可能会关闭。If a fatal (for example, a SQL Server severity level of 20 or greater) is generated by the method executing an , the , the connection may be closed. 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 ，以及 和 从 Access 数据库中选择行。The following example uses the , along and , to select rows from an Access database. 然后返回填充的 。The filled is then returned. 该示例传递了一个初始化的 、一个连接字符串、一个 SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串以及一个作为源数据库表的名称的字符串。The example is passed an initialized , a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the source database table. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 尝试取消执行 。

span.span: Tries to cancel the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有要取消的命令，则不会有任何反应。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing occurs. 但是，如果有正在执行的命令，则即使取消尝试失败，也不会生成异常。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，执行该操作，然后取消执行。The following example creates an , executes it, and then cancels the execution. 为实现此目的，向方法传递了一个字符串，该字符串是一个 SQL SELECT 语句和一个用于连接到数据源的字符串。To accomplish this, the method is passed a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Cancel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Cancel Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Cancel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Cancel Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要对数据源执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute at the data source.

value.span: 要执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时， 属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 如果存储过程名称包含任何特殊字符，则可能需要用户使用转义符语法。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 调用 `Execute` 方法之一时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods. 如果 设置为 `TableDirect`，则 属性应设置为要访问的一个或多个表的名称。When is set to `TableDirect`, the property should be set to the name of the table or tables to be accessed. 如果任何指定的表包含任何特殊字符，则用户可能需要使用转义符语法。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if any of the named tables contain any special characters. 调用 `Execute` 方法之一时，将返回已命名的一个或多个表的所有行和列。All rows and columns of the named table or tables will be returned when you call one of the `Execute` methods. 如果当前连接正在执行执行或提取操作，则不能设置 、和 属性。You cannot set the , , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. OLE DB.NET 提供程序不支持使用命名参数将参数传递给 SQL 语句，或在将 设置为 `Text`时将参数传递给 。The OLE DB.NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL Statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to `Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用问号（？）占位符。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如:For example: `SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ?` 因此， 对象添加到 的顺序必须直接与参数的问号占位符的位置相对应。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在终止尝试执行命令并生成错误之前的等待时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the wait time (in seconds) before terminating an attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

value.span: 等待命令执行所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值0表示没有限制，应避免在 中，因为尝试执行命令会无限期地等待。A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a because an attempt to execute a command will wait indefinitely.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何解释 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how the property is interpreted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时，应将 属性设置为存储过程的名称。When you set the property to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the name of the stored procedure. 在调用执行方法之一时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. 如果当前连接正在执行执行或提取操作，则不能设置 、 和 属性。The , and properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. OLE DB .NET 提供程序不支持使用命名参数将参数传递给 SQL 语句或由 在 设置为文本时调用的存储过程。The OLE DB .NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to Text. 在这种情况下，必须使用问号（？）占位符。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如:For example: `SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ?` 因此， 对象添加到 的顺序必须直接与参数的问号占位符的位置相对应。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前连接正在执行执行或提取操作，则不能设置 、 和 属性。You cannot set the , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 如果在事务执行过程中设置了 ，并且 属性不为 null，则会生成 。If you set while a transaction is in progress and the property is not null, an is generated. 如果 属性不为 null，而事务已提交或回滚，则会将 设置为 null。If the property is not null and the transaction has already been committed or rolled back, is set to null. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Connection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Connection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Connection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Connection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 针对 执行 SQL 语句并返回受影响的行数。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 来执行目录操作，例如，查询数据库的结构或创建数据库对象（如表），或者通过执行 UPDATE、INSERT，在不使用 的情况下更改数据库中的数据或 DELETE 语句。You can use the to perform catalog operations, for example, to query the structure of a database or to create database objects such as tables, or to change the data in a database without using a by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 尽管 未返回任何行，但映射到参数的任何输出参数或返回值都将用数据填充。Although the returns no rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 如果发生回滚，则返回值也为-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后使用 执行它。The following example creates an and then executes it using . 该示例向传递了一个字符串，该字符串是 SQL 语句，如 UPDATE、INSERT 或 DELETE 以及用于连接到数据源的字符串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE, and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不能在连接最初在其中登记的上下文之外的事务上下文中执行命令。

span.span: Cannot execute a command within a transaction context that differs from the context in which the connection was originally enlisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时， 属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 调用 时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 在关闭 之前，请先关闭 对象。Before you close the , first close the object. 如果打算重用 对象，还必须关闭 对象。You must also close the object if you plan to reuse an object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后通过传递作为 SQL SELECT 语句的字符串以及用于连接到数据源的字符串来执行它。The following example creates an , and then executes it by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将 发送到 ，并使用 值之一构造 。

span.span: Sends the to the , and builds an using one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 对象的 方法指定 时，OLE DB 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序将使用 OLE DB **IRow**接口（如果可用）执行绑定。When you specify with the method of the object, the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB performs binding using the OLE DB **IRow** interface if it is available. 否则，它将使用**IRowset**接口。Otherwise, it uses the **IRowset** interface. 如果期望 SQL 语句仅返回一行，则指定 也可提高应用程序性能。If your SQL statement is expected to return only a single row, specifying can also improve application performance. 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时， 属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 调用 时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 支持一种特殊模式，该模式允许有效读取较大的二进制值。The supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently. 有关详细信息，请参阅 的 `SequentialAccess` 设置。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 在关闭 之前，请先关闭 对象。Before you close the , first close the object. 如果打算重用 对象，还必须关闭 对象。You must also close the object if you plan to reuse an object. 如果 是在 设置为 `CloseConnection`时创建的，则关闭 会自动关闭连接。If the is created with set to `CloseConnection`, closing the closes the connection automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后通过传递一个字符串（一个 Transact-sql SELECT 语句）和一个用于连接到数据源的字符串来执行它。The following example creates an , and then executes it by passing a string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source. 将 设置为 。 is set to . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

abstract member ExecuteScalar : unit -> obj override this.ExecuteScalar : unit -> obj
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed

summary.span: 执行查询，并返回由查询返回的结果集中的第一行的第一列。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: 其他列或行将被忽略。

span.span: Additional columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 结果集中第一行的第一列或 null 引用（如果结果集为空）。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法从数据源中检索单个值，例如聚合值。Use the method to retrieve a single value, for example, an aggregate value, from a data source. 这需要比使用 方法更少的代码，然后使用 返回的数据执行生成单个值所需的操作。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations that are required to generate the single value using the data returned by an . 典型 查询的格式如下所C#示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM region"; Int32 count = (int32) ExecuteScalar(); ``` ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后使用 执行它。The following example creates an and then executes it using . 该示例向传递了一个字符串，该字符串是返回聚合结果的 SQL 语句以及用于连接到数据源的字符串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement that returns an aggregate result, and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As OleDbParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取 。

value.span: SQL 语句或存储过程的参数。

span.span: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OLE DB .NET 提供程序不支持使用命名参数将参数传递给 SQL 语句或由 在 设置为 `Text`时调用的存储过程。The OLE DB .NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to `Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用问号（？）占位符。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如:For example: `SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ?` 因此， 对象添加到 的顺序必须直接对应于命令文本中参数的问号占位符的位置。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter in the command text. > [!NOTE] > 如果集合中的参数与要执行的查询的要求不匹配，则可能会导致错误。If the parameters in the collection do not match the requirements of the query to be executed, an error may result. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并显示其参数。The following example creates an and displays its parameters. 为实现此目的，将向方法传递一个 、一个 SQL SELECT 语句和一个 对象的数组。To accomplish this, the method is passed an , a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and an array of objects. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在数据源上创建准备就绪（或已编译）的命令版本。

span.span: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `TableDirect`，则 不执行任何操作。If the property is set to `TableDirect`, does nothing. 如果 设置为 `StoredProcedure`，则对 的调用应会成功，但这可能会导致无操作。If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to should succeed, although it may cause a no-op. 在调用 之前，请在要准备的语句中指定每个参数的数据类型。Before you call , specify the data type of each parameter in the statement to be prepared. 对于具有可变长度数据类型的每个参数，必须将 " **size** " 属性设置为所需的最大大小。For each parameter that has a variable length data type, you must set the **Size** property to the maximum size needed. 如果未满足这些条件， 将返回错误。 returns an error if these conditions are not met. 如果在调用 之后调用 `Execute` 方法，则大于**Size**属性指定的值的任何参数值都将自动截断为该参数的原始指定大小，并且不返回截断错误。If you call an `Execute` method after you call , any parameter value that is larger than the value specified by the **Size** property is automatically truncated to the original specified size of the parameter, and no truncation errors are returned. 输出参数（是否准备好）必须具有用户指定的数据类型。Output parameters (whether prepared or not) must have a user-specified data type. 如果指定可变长度数据类型，则还必须指定最大**大小**。If you specify a variable length data type, you must also specify the maximum **Size**. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并打开连接。The following example creates an and opens the connection. 然后，该示例通过传递一个字符串（一个 SQL SELECT 语句）和一个用于连接到数据源的字符串来准备数据源上的存储过程。The example then prepares a stored procedure on the data source by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性已设置为特定值，并且命令正在执行过程中，则不能设置此属性。You cannot set the property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing. 如果将 transaction 属性设置为不与 对象连接到相同 的 对象，则在下一次尝试执行语句时，将引发异常。If you set the transaction property to an object that is not connected to the same as the object, an exception is thrown the next time that you try to execute a statement.

summary.span: 获取或设置命令结果在由 的 方法使用时如何应用于 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认 值为，除非自动生成命令（与 ），在这种情况下，默认值为 None。The default value is Both unless the command is automatically generated (as with the ), in which case the default is None. 有关如何使用 属性的详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).
